text.searchBar: Search Identity by identity name or display name. Please select an identity to continue the guide tour.
text.highlightFilter: Select assigned/detect roles or workgroups to highlight nodes in the chart.
text.action-buttons: Click on each action button to perform different operation on the orgchart.
text.action-buttons-fitScreen: Resize the chart to fit into screen size.
text.action-buttons-compact: Re-arrange the organizational chart to compact display.
text.action-buttons-markRoot: Highlight the path from the selected node to the root.
text.action-buttons-details: Display additional information on the node object, e.g. extended attributes, role assignments, policy violations.
text.action-buttons-swapDirection: Change the direction of the organizational chart
text.action-buttons-collapseAll: Collapse all nodes of the organizational chart
text.action-buttons-expandAll: Expand all nodes of the organizational chart
text.action-buttons-connections: Add connection node to the link based on pre-configured rule.
text.action-buttons-downloadPDF: Export the organizational chart in PDF file
